text:
Hi.
i use tomcat 3.2.1 under a nt4/sp6 intel box.
i am developing servlets, and (inacurate part coming)it seems that sometimes 
when updating servlets (without restarting tomcat), i see an error.
I use threads, intensively, and httpsessions. Because of this error, the session 
i used is closed, or maybe the error comes from the session being closed...

Here is the error stack trace..
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2001-02-23 01:40:35 - Ctx(  ): Exception in init  Can't happen - classname is 
null, who added this ? - java.lang.IllegalStateException: Can't happen - 
classname is null, who added this ?
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.loadServlet(ServletWrapper.java:261)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.init(ServletWrapper.java:289)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.Handler.service(Handler.java:254)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.service(ServletWrapper.java:372)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.handleStatus(ContextManager.java:1049)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.internalService(ContextManager.java:783)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service(ContextManager.java:743)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.service.http.HttpConnectionHandler.processConnection(HttpConne
ctionHandler.java:210)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.service.TcpWorkerThread.runIt(PoolTcpEndpoint.java:416)
        at 
org.apache.tomcat.util.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run(ThreadPool.java:498)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

2001-02-23 01:40:35 - Ctx(  ): IllegalStateException in: R(  + /faq + null)
 Can't happen - classname is null, who added this ?
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

i am using jdk 1.3.0.1, from Sun. jre is 1.3.0.1 from sun, also.

I don't know who added the test, but he certainly was right...
creator: lists@io-labs.com
